items.title: Federal tax support added — update pending App Store approval
items.summary: We’ve pushed an update adding federal tax handling. Some users may need to re-check or re-enter tax settings. Awaiting App Store approval.
items.body:
At 6:44 PM EST on February 26, 2026, we pushed an update that adds federal tax support inside Infinitum Creator Ledger.

As part of this release, some existing users may notice that certain tax settings have reset to defaults. If that applies to you, please review your tax configuration and re-enter any necessary values to ensure accurate calculations.

We are currently waiting on App Store approval before this update becomes publicly available. Once approved, the update will roll out automatically.

Thank you for your patience as we continue improving tax accuracy and compliance features.

items.title: Agency financial & performance tracking in testing
items.summary: Agency tools for tracking business earnings, expenses, and monthly network performance are now in testing. Production release coming soon.
items.body:
As of February 26, 2026, Agency and Creator Network features have entered active testing.

These tools are built specifically for agency owners and creator networks to:

• Track agency-level earnings and operational business expenses in one structured system.
• Monitor overall network performance across months in a clearer, more organized way than existing platform-provided tools.
• View trends and performance changes over time without relying on manual spreadsheets or fragmented reporting.

This is focused on giving agencies better financial clarity and long-term performance visibility.

We are currently validating calculation accuracy, reporting consistency, and monthly aggregation logic before moving these features into full production.

If you operate an agency or creator network, streamlined business financial tracking and improved monthly performance monitoring is coming soon.

items.title: Milestone rewards: free subscription for early supporters
items.summary: At 1K, 5K, 10K, 20K, and 50K users the first 1,000 get 1 month free. At 100K the first 100 get 1 year free. Check the live count here—one user per device.
items.body: We're celebrating growth with real rewards. When we hit 1,000 unique users (one per device), the first 1,000 get a free month. Same deal at 5,000, 10,000, 20,000, and 50,000: the first 1,000 at each milestone get 1 month free. When we reach 100,000 users, the first 100 get one year free. Share the app with other creators and watch the live creator count on this News page—only one user per device counts, so every share matters. Promo codes will be shared in-app and via our channels as we hit each milestone.

items.title: Infinitum Creator Ledger has launched
items.summary: Infinitum Creator Ledger is now available. Track LIVEs, earnings, and exports in one place.
items.body: On February 22, 2026, Infinitum Creator Ledger launched. Use the app to log your LIVE streams, track earnings, and export data from Export Center for taxes and reporting. Thank you for being part of the launch.
